mapper.insert: insert into mydata.menu_info (menu_id, menu_name, menu_state, url, super_menu_id) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_state, url, super_menu_id from mydata.menu_info
